subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Luke Donald is on the verge of becoming the first golfer to win the European and American money titles, shooting a six-under-par 66 in the third round of the Dubai World Championship.
snippet: Top-ranked Luke Donald is on the verge of becoming the first golfer to win the European and American money titles, shooting a six-under-par 66 in the third round of the Dubai World Championship.
